thread.title: New diverse art display opens at New York's Gracie Mansion
thread.title_full: New diverse art display opens at New York's Gracie Mansion

title: New diverse art display opens at New York's Gracie Mansion
text: > Entertainment New diverse art display opens at New York's Gracie Mansion Gracie Mansion's living room features a chandler and a wall mirror with candle stands, Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in New York. Mayor Bill de Blasio and his wife, Chirlane McCray, are installing new artwork at Grace Mansion in an exhibition, "Windows On The City," that they say depicts the city's full history and meant to capture life in New York in 1799 when the mansion was built. (AP Photo/Bebeto Matthews)
